entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023
